page.name: Step-by-Step Guide
page.content:
Step-by-Step Guide

  1. Make the Sign of the Cross (crucifix)
  2. Pray the Apostles' Creed (crucifix)
  3. Pray the Our Father (first bead)
  4. Pray three Hail Marys (three beads)
  5. Pray the Glory Be
  6. Announce the First Mystery, pray Our Father
  7. Pray ten Hail Marys while meditating
  8. Pray Glory Be (and optional Fatima Prayer)
  9. Repeat for remaining four decades
  10. Pray the Hail Holy Queen
  11. Pray the Concluding Prayer
  12. Make the Sign of the Cross

Time: About 15-20 minutes for five decades.
